GV05agsas_1u:5: oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadraṃ paśyemākṣabhiryajatrāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:8: svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:9: svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatirdadhātu //
GV05agsas_1u:13: prajñānāṃśupratānaiḥ sthiracaranikaravyāpibhir vyāpya lokān bhuktvā bhogānsthaviṣṭhānpunarapi dhiṣaṇodbhāsitānkāmajanyān /
GV05agsas_1u:14: pītvā sarvān viśeṣān svapiti madhurabhuṅ māyayā bhojayanno māyāsaṃkhyāturīyaṃ paramamṛtamajaṃ brahma yattannato 'smi //1//
GV05agsas_1u:15: yo viśvātmā vidhijaviṣayān prāśya bhogān sthaviṣṭhān paścāc cānyān svamativibhavāñ jyotiṣā svena sūkṣmān /
GV05agsas_1u:16: sarvān etān punar api śanaiḥ svātmani sthāpayitvā hitvā sarvānviśeṣānvigataguṇagaṇaḥ pātvasau nasturīyaḥ //2//
GV05agsas_1u:22: yānyeva tu vedānte sambandhābhidheya prayojanāni tānyeveha bhavitumarhanti /
GV05agsas_1u:24: tatra prayojanavat sādhanābhivyañjakatvenābhidheyasambaddhaṃ śāstraṃ pāramparyeṇa viśiṣṭasaṃbandhābhidheyaprayojanavad bhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:25: kiṃ punas tat prayojanam ity ucyate rogārtasyaiva roganivṛttau svasthatā /
GV05agsas_1u:28: dvaitaprapañcasyāvidyākṛtatvād vidyayā tad upaśamaḥ syād iti brahmavidyāprakāśanāyāsya ārambhaḥ kriyate /
GV05agsas_1u:31: 14) “yatra vānyad iva syāt tatrānyo 'nyat paśyed anyo 'nyad vijānīyāt“(bṛ.u 4 /
GV05agsas_1u:33: 31) “yatra vāsya sarvam ātmaivābhūt tat kena kaṃ paśyet kena kaṃ vijānīyāt“(bṛ.u 2 /
GV05agsas_1u:36: tatra tāvad oṃkāranirṇayāya prathamaṃ prakaraṇam āgamapradhānām ātmatattvapratipatty upāyabhūtam /
GV05agsas_1u:37: yasya dvaitaprapañcasyopaśame 'dvaitapratipattī rajjvām iva sarpādivikalpa upaśame rajjutattvapratipattis tasya dvaitasya hetuto vaitathyapratipādanāya dvitīyaṃ prakaraṇam /
GV05agsas_1u:38: tathādvaitasyāpi vaitathyaprasaṅgaprāptau yuktitas tathātvadarśanāya tṛtīyaṃ prakaraṇam /
GV05agsas_1u:39: advaitasya tathātvapratipattipakṣabhūtāni yāni vādāntarāṇyavaidikāni teṣām anyonyavirodhitvādatathārthatvena tadupapattibhir eva nirākaraṇāya caturthaṃ prakaraṇam /
GV05agsas_1u:40: kathaṃ puna oṃkāranirṇaya ātmatattvapratipatty upāyatvaṃ pratipadyata ity ucyate“oṃ ity etat“(ka.u 1 /
GV05agsas_1u:51: rajjur ādir iva sarpādivikalpasyāspado 'dvaya ātmā paramārthaḥ sanprāṇādivikalpasyāspado yathā tathā sarvo 'pi vākprapañcaḥ prāṇādy ātmavikalpaviṣaya oṃkāra eva /
GV05agsas_1u:53: oṃkāravikāraśabdābhidheyaś ca sarvaḥ prāṇādir ātmavikalpo 'bhidhānavyatirekeṇa nāsti /
GV05agsas_1u:56: 4) “tad asyedaṃ vācā tantyā nāmabhir dāmabhiḥ sarvaṃ sitam” “sarvaṃ hīdaṃ nāmāni“ity ādi śrutibhyaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:58: oṃ ity etad akṣaram idaṃ sarvaṃ tasyopavyākhyānaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavad bhaviṣyad iti sarvam oṃkāra eva /
GV05agsas_1u:59: yac cānyat trikālātītaṃ tad apy oṃkāra eva // MandUp_1 //
GV05agsas_1u:62: oṃ ity etad akṣaram idaṃ sarvam iti /
GV05agsas_1u:63: yad idam arthajātam abhidheyabhūtaṃ tasyābhidhānāvyatirekād abhidhānasya ca oṃkārāvyatirekād oṃkāra evedaṃ sarvam /
GV05agsas_1u:64: paraṃ ca brahmābhidhānābhidheya upāyapūrvakam eva gamyata ity oṃkāra eva /
GV05agsas_1u:65: tasyaitasya parāpara brahmarūpasyākṣarasya oṃ ity etasyopavyākhyānam;
GV05agsas_1u:66: brahmapratipatty upāyatvād brahmasamīpatayā vispaṣṭaṃ prakathanam upavyākhyānaṃ prastutaṃ veditavyam iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:67: bhūtaṃ bhavadbhaviṣyad iti kālatrayaparicchedyaṃ yat tad apy oṃkāra evoktanyāyataḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:68: yac cānyat trikālātītaṃ kāryādhigamyaṃ kālāparicchedyamavyākṛtādi tad apy oṃkāra eva //1//
GV05agsas_1u:72: oṃ ity etad akṣaram idaṃ sarvam ity ādy abhidhānaprādhānyena nirdiṣṭasya puno 'bhidheyaprādhānyena nirdeśo 'bhidhānābhidheyayor ekatvapratipatty arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:73: itaro 'thā hy abhidhānatantrābhidheyapratipattir ity abhidheyasyābhidhānatvaṃ gauṇām ity āśaṅkā syāt /
GV05agsas_1u:74: ekatvapratipatteś ca prayojanam abhidhānābhidheyayor ekenaiva prayatnena yugapatpravilāparyastadvilakṣaṇaṃ brahma pratipadyeta iti /
GV05agsas_1u:75: tathā ca vakṣyati“pādā mātrā mātrāś ca pādāḥ” (mā.u.8) iti /
GV05agsas_1u:77: sarvaṃ hy etad brahmāyam ātmā brahma so 'yam ātmā catuṣpāt // MandUp_2 //
GV05agsas_1u:81: sarvaṃ yad uktam oṃkāramātram iti tadetad brahma /
GV05agsas_1u:82: tac ca brahma parokṣābhihitaṃ pratyakṣato viśeṣeṇa nirdiśatyayamātmā brahmeti /
GV05agsas_1u:83: ayam iti catuṣpātvena pravibhajyamānaṃ pratyagātmatayābhinayena nirdiśati ayam ātmeti /
GV05agsas_1u:84: so 'yamātma oṃkārābhidheyaḥ parāparatvena vyavasthitaś catuṣpātkārṣāpaṇavan na gaur iveti /
GV05agsas_1u:85: trayāṇāṃ viśvādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvapravilāpanena turīyasya pratapattir iti karaṇasādhanaḥ pādaśabdaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:90: jāgaritasthāno bahiḥprajñaḥ saptāṅga ekonaviṃśatimukhaḥ sthūlabhug vaiśvānaraḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ // MandUp_3 //
GV05agsas_1u:94: bahiṣprajñaḥ svātmavyatirikte viṣaye prajñā sa bahiṣprajño bahir viṣaya eva prajñāvidyākṛtāv avabhāsata ity arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:95: tathā saptāṅgānyasya“tasya ha vaitasyātmano vaiśvānarasya mūrdhaiva sutejāś cakṣurviśvarūpaḥ prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmātmā saṃdoho bahulo vastir eva rayiḥ pṛthivy eva pādau” (chā.u.5 /
GV05agsas_1u:97: 2) ity agnihotrakalpanāśeṣatvenāhavanīyo 'gnir asya mukhatvenokta ity evaṃ saptāṅgāni yasya sa saptāṅgaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:98_0: tathaikonaviṃśatir mukhāny asya buddhīndriyāṇi karmendriyāṇi ca daśa vāyavaś ca prāṇādayaḥpañca
GV05agsas_1u:98_1: mano buddhirahaṅkāraccittam iti mukhānīva mukhāni tāny upalabdhidvārāṇityarthaḥ sa
GV05agsas_1u:98_2: evaṃ viśiṣṭo vaiśvānaro yathoktair dvāraiḥ śabdādīn sthūlān viṣayān bhuṅkta iti sthūlabhuk /
GV05agsas_1u:100: yad vā viśvaś cāsau naraś ceti viśvānaraḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:104: katham ayamātmā brahmeti pratyagātmano 'sya catuṣpāttve prakṛte dyulokādīnāṃ mūrdhādyaṅgatvam iti /
GV05agsas_1u:108: sarvabhūtasthaś cātmaiko dṛṣṭaḥ syāt sarvabhūtāni cātmani /
GV05agsas_1u:111: anyathā hi svadehaparicchinna eva pratyāgātmā sāṃkhyādibhir iva dṛṣṭaḥ syāt tathā ca satyadvaitam iti śrutikṛto viśeṣo na syāt sāṃkhyādidarśanenāviśeṣāt /
GV05agsas_1u:113: ato yuktam evāsyādhyātmikasya piṇḍātmano dyulokādy aṅgatvena virāḍātmanādhidaivikenaikatvam abhipretya saptāṅgatvavacanam /
GV05agsas_1u:118: uktaṃ caitan madhubrāhmaṇe“yaś cāyam asyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ tejomayo 'mṛtamayaḥ puruṣo yac cāyam adhyātmam“(bṛ.u.2 / 5 / 1) ityādi /
GV05agsas_1u:119: suṣuptāvyākṛtayaḥ sa tv ekatvaṃ siddham eva nirviśeṣatvāt /
GV05agsas_1u:120: evaṃ ca satyetat siddhaṃ bhaviṣyati sarvadvaita upaśame cādvaitam iti //3//
GV05agsas_1u:123: svaprasthāno 'ntaḥprajñaḥ saptāṅga ekonaviṃśatimukhaḥ praviviktabhuktaijaso dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // MandUp_4 //
GV05agsas_1u:127: jāgratprajñānekasādhanā bahir viṣaya evāvabhāsamānā manaḥspandanamātrā satī tathābhūtaṃ saṃskāraṃ manasyādhatte /
GV05agsas_1u:128: tan manas tathā saṃskṛtaṃ citrita iva paṭo bāhyasādhanān anapekṣam avidyākāmakarmabhiḥ preryamāṇaṃ jāgradvadavabhāsate /
GV05agsas_1u:129: tathā coktam“asya lokasya sarvāvato mātrām apādāya“(bṛ.u.4 / 3 / 9) iti /
GV05agsas_1u:131: 2) iti prastutya“atraiṣa devaḥ svapne mahimānam anubhavati“(pra.u.4 /
GV05agsas_1u:133: indriyāpekṣayāntaḥsthatvān manasas tad vāsanārūpā ca svapne prajñā yasyātyantaḥprajñaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:134: viṣayaśūnyānāṃ prajñāyāṃ kevalaprakāśasvarūpāyāṃ viṣayitvena bhavatīti taijasaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:136: iha punaḥ kevalā vāsanāmātrā prajñā bhojyeti pravivikto bhoga iti /
GV05agsas_1u:141: darśanādarśanavṛttyas tatvāprabodhalakṣaṇasya svāpasya tulyatvāt suṣuptigrahaṇārthaṃ yatra supta ityādi viśeṣaṇam /
GV05agsas_1u:142: atha vā triṣv api sthāneṣu tattvāpratibodhalakṣaṇaḥ svāpo 'viśiṣṭa iti pūrvābhyāṃ suṣuptaṃ vibhajate
GV05agsas_1u:143: yatra supto na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati tat suṣuptam /
GV05agsas_1u:144: suṣuptasthāna ekībhūtaḥ prajñānaghana evāndamayo hy ānandabhukcetomukhaḥ prājñaḥ tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ // MandUp_5 //
GV05agsas_1u:147: yatra yasmin sthāne kāle vā supto na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate /
GV05agsas_1u:148: na hi suṣupte pūrvayor ivānyathāgrahaṇalakṣaṇaṃ svapnadarśanaṃ kāmo vā kaścana vidyane /
GV05agsas_1u:150: sthānadvayapravibhaktaṃ manaḥ spanditaṃ dvaitajātaṃ tathā rūpāparityāgenāvivekāpannaṃ naiśatamograstamivāhaḥ saprapañcamekībhūtam ity ucyate /
GV05agsas_1u:151: ata eva svapnajāgran manaḥspandanāni prajñānāni ghanībhūtānīva seyamavasthāvivekarūpatvāt prajñānaghanocyate /
GV05agsas_1u:152: yathā rātrau naiśena tamasā vibhajyamānaṃ sarvaṃ ghanam iva tadvat prajñānaghana eva /
GV05agsas_1u:155: yathā loke nirāyāsasthitaḥ sukhyānandabhugucyate 'tyantānāyāsarūpā hīyaṃ sthitiranenānubhūyata ity ānandabhuk“eṣo 'sya parama ānandaḥ“(bṛ.u.4 / 3 / 32) iti śruteḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:157: bodhalakṣaṇaṃ vā ceto dvāraṃ mukham asya svapnādy āgamanaṃ pratīti cetomukhaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:160: athavā prajñaptimātram asyaivāsādhāraṇaṃ rūpam iti prājña itarayor viśiṣṭam api vijñānam asti /
GV05agsas_1u:164: eṣaḥ sarveśvara eṣa sarvajña eṣo 'ntaryāmy eṣa yoniḥ sarvasya prabhavāpyayau hi bhūtānām // MandUp_6 //
GV05agsas_1u:167: eṣa hi svarūpāvasthaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sādhidaivikasya bhedajātasya sarvasyeśitā naitasmāj jātyantarabhūto 'nyeṣām iva /
GV05agsas_1u:169: ayam eva hi sarvasya sarvabhedāvastho jñātetyeṣa sarvajñaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:170: eṣo 'ntaryāmy antaranupraviśya sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ niyantāpy eṣa eva /
GV05agsas_1u:171: ata eva yathoktaṃ sabhedaṃ jagatprasūyata ity eṣa yoniḥ sarvasya /
GV05agsas_1u:172: yata evaṃ prabhavaś cāpi yaś ca prabhavāpyayau hi bhūtānām eṣa eva //6//
GV05agsas_1u:178: bahiḥprajño vibhuḥ viśvo hy antaḥprajñas tu taijasaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:179: ghanaprajñaḥ tathā prājña eka eva tridhā smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_1.1 //
GV05agsas_1u:183: paryāyeṇa tristhānatvāt sa aham iti smṛtyā pratisandhānāc ca sthānatrayavyatiriktamekatvaṃ śuddhatvam asaṅgatvaṃ ca siddham ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:187: jāgaritāvasthāyām eva viśvādīnāṃ trayāṇām anubhavapradarśanārtho 'yaṃ ślokaḥ
GV05agsas_1u:188: dakṣiṇākṣimukhe viśvo manasy antas tu taijasaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:189: ākāśe ca hṛdi prājñas tridhā dehe vyavasthitaḥ // MandUpK_1.2 //
GV05agsas_1u:192: dakṣiṇam akṣyeva mukhaṃ tasminprādhānyena draṣṭā sthūlānāṃ viśvo 'nubhūyate“indho ha vai nāmaiṣa yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣan puruṣaḥ” /
GV05agsas_1u:195: ādityāntargato vairāja ātmā cakṣuṣi ca draṣṭaikaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:203: “sarveṣu karaṇeṣv aviśeṣe 'pi dakṣiṇākṣaṇy upalabdhipāṭavadarśanāt tatra viśeṣeṇa nirdeśo viśvasya /
GV05agsas_1u:204: dakṣiṇākṣigato rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā nimīlitākṣas tadeva smaran manasyantaḥ svapna iva tadeva vāsanārūpābhivyaktaṃ paśyati /
GV05agsas_1u:206: ato manasyantas tu taijaso 'pi viśva eva /
GV05agsas_1u:207: ākāśe ca hṛdi smaraṇākhyavyāpāroparame prājña ekībhūto ghanaprajña eva bhavati manovyāpārābhāvāt /
GV05agsas_1u:208: darśanasmaraṇa eva hi manaḥspandite tadabhāve hṛdyevāviśeṣeṇa prāṇātmanāvasthānam /
GV05agsas_1u:209: “prāṇo hy evaitān sarvān saṃvṛṅkte“(chā.4 / 3 / 3) iti śruteḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:219: yadyapi prāṇābhimāne sati vyākṛtataiva prāṇasya tathāpi piṇḍaparicchinnaviśeṣābhimānanirodhaḥ prāṇobhavatītyavyākṛta eva prāṇaḥ suṣupte paricchinnābhimānavatām /
GV05agsas_1u:220: yathā prāṇalaye paricchinnābhimānināṃ prāṇo 'vyākṛtas tathā prāṇābhimānino 'py aviśeṣāpattāvavyākṛtatā samānā prasavabījātmakatvaṃ ca tadadhyakṣaś caiko 'vyākṛtāvasthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:221: paricchinnābhimāninām adhyakṣāṇāṃ ca tena ekatvam iti pūrvoktaṃ viśeṣaṇamekībhūta prajñānaghana ityādyupapantam /
GV05agsas_1u:229: yady api tadbrahma prāṇaśabdavācyaṃ tatra tathāpi jīvaprasavabījātmakatvam apiratyajya eva prāṇaśabdatvaṃ sataḥ sacchabdavācyatā ca /
GV05agsas_1u:230: yadi hi nirbījarūpaṃ vivakṣitaṃ brahmābhaviṣyat“neti neti“(bṛ.u.4.4.2.24.5.15)
GV05agsas_1u:234: nirbījatayaiva cet sati līnānāṃ suṣuptapralayayoḥ punarutthānānupapattiḥ syāt /
GV05agsas_1u:237: tasmāt sa bījatvābhyupagamena eva sataḥ prāṇatvavyapadeśaḥ sarvaśrutiṣu ca kāraṇatvavyapadeśaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:243: tāṃ bījāvasthāṃ tasyaiva prājñaśabdavācyasya turīyatvena dehādisaṃbandhajāgradādirahitāṃ pāramārthikīṃ pṛthagvakṣyati /
GV05agsas_1u:244: bījāvasthāpi na kiñcidavediṣamityutthitasya pratyayadarśanāddehe 'nubhūyata eveti tridhā dehe vyavasthitety ucyate //2//
GV05agsas_1u:247: viśvaḥ hi sthūlabhuṅ nityaṃ taijasaḥ praviviktabhuk /
GV05agsas_1u:248: ānandabhuk tathā prājñastridhā bhogaṃ nibodhata // MandUpK_1.3 //
GV05agsas_1u:249: sthūlaṃ tarpayate viśvaṃ praviviktaṃ tu taijasam /
GV05agsas_1u:250: ānandaś ca tathā prājñaṃ tridhā tṛptiṃ nibodhata // MandUpK_1.4 //
GV05agsas_1u:256: triṣu dhāmasu yadbhojyaṃ bhoktā yaś ca prakīrtitaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:257: vadaitadubhayaṃ yas tu sa bhuñjāno na lipyate // MandUpK_1.5 //
GV05agsas_1u:260: triṣu dhāmasu jāgradādiṣu sthūlapraviviktānandākhyaṃ bhojyam ekaṃ tridhābhūtam /
GV05agsas_1u:261: yaś ca viśvataijasaprājñākhyo bhoktaikaḥ sa aham ityekatvenapratisaṃdhānāddraṣṭutvāviśeṣāc ca prakīrtitaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:262: yo vedaitadubhayaṃ bhojyabhoktṛtayānekadhā bhinnaṃ sa bhuñjāno na lipyate /
GV05agsas_1u:264: na hi yasya yo viṣayaḥ sa tena hīyate vardhate vā na hy agniḥ svaviṣayaṃ dagdhvā kāṣṭhādi tadvat //5//
GV05agsas_1u:268: sarvaṃ janayati prāṇaś ceto 'ṃśūn puruṣaḥ pṛthak // MandUpK_1.6 //
GV05agsas_1u:271: satāṃ vidyamānānāṃ svenāvidyākṛtanāmarūpamāyāsvarūpeṇa sarvabhāvānāṃ viśvataijasaprājñabhedānāṃ prabhavotpattiḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:272: vakṣyati ca“vandhyāputro na tattvena māyayā vāpi jāyate“iti /
GV05agsas_1u:273: yadi hy asatām eva janma syād brahmaṇo 'vyavahāryasya grahaṇadvārābhāvādasatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:274: dṛṣṭaṃ ca rajjusarpādīnām avidyākṛtamāyābījotpannānāṃ rajjvādy ātmanā satvam /
GV05agsas_1u:275: na hi nirāspadā rajjusarpamṛgatṛṣṇikādayaḥ kvacid upalabhyante kenacit /
GV05agsas_1u:276: yathā rajjvāṃ prāksarpotpatte rajjvātmanāṃ sarpaḥ sanneva āsīd evaṃ sarvabhāvānām utpatteḥ prākprāṇabījātmanaiva satvam /
GV05agsas_1u:279_0: sarvaṃ janayati prāṇaścetoṃ'śūnaṃśava iva raveś cidātmakasya puruṣasya cetorūpā jalārkasamāḥ
GV05agsas_1u:279_2: pṛthag viṣayabhāvavilakṣaṇān agniviṣphuliṅgavat salakṣaṇāñjalārkavac ca jīvalakṣaṇāṃstvitarān
GV05agsas_1u:284: vibhūtiṃ prasavaṃ tv anye manyante sṛṣṭicintakāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:288: vibhūtir vistāreśvarasya sṛṣṭir iti sṛṣṭicintakā manyante na tu paramārthacintakānāṃ sṛṣṭav ādara ity arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:290_0: na hi māyāvinaṃ sūtram ākāśe nikṣipya tena sāyudham āruhya cakṣurgocaratām atītya
GV05agsas_1u:290_1: yuddhena khaṇḍaśaśchinnaṃ patitaṃ punarutthitaṃ ca paśyatāṃ tat kṛtaṃ māyādisatatvacintāyām ādaro bhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:291: tathaivāyaṃ māyāvinaḥ sūtraprasāraṇasamaḥ suṣuptasvapnādivikāsastadārūḍhamayāvisamaś ca tatsthaḥ prājñataijasādiḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:292: sūtratadārūḍhābhyāmanyaḥ paramārthamāyāvī sa eva bhūmiṣṭho māyāchanno 'dṛśyamāna eva sthito yathā tathā turīyākhyaṃ paramārthatattvam /
GV05agsas_1u:293: atas tac cintāyām evādaro mumukṣūṇāmāryāṇāṃ na niṣprayojanāyāṃ sṛṣṭav ādara ityataḥ sṛṣṭicintakānām evaite vikalpety āha svapnamāyāsarūpeti /
GV05agsas_1u:297: icchāmātraṃ prabhoḥ sṛṣṭir iti sṛṣṭau viniścitāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:298: kālāt prasūtiṃ bhūtānāṃ manyante kālacintakāḥ // MandUpK_1.8 //
GV05agsas_1u:301: icchāmātraṃ prabhoḥ satyasaṃkalpatvāt sṛṣṭir ghaṭādiḥ saṃkalpanāmātraṃ na saṃkalpanātiriktam /
GV05agsas_1u:305: bhogārthaṃ sṛṣṭir iti anye krīḍārtham iti cāpare /
GV05agsas_1u:306: devasyaiṣa svabhāvo 'yam āptakāmasya kā spṛhā // MandUpK_1.9 //
GV05agsas_1u:309: bhogārthaṃ krīḍārtham iti cānye sṛṣṭiṃ manyante /
GV05agsas_1u:310: anayoḥ pakṣayor dūṣaṇaṃ devasyaiṣa svabhāvo 'yam iti devasya svabhāvapakṣam āśritya sarveṣāṃ vā pakṣāṇām āptakāmasya kā spṛheti /
GV05agsas_1u:311: na hi rajjvādīnām avidyāsvabhāvavyatirekeṇa sarpādyābhāsatve kāraṇaṃ śakyaṃ vaktum //9//
GV05agsas_1u:314: caturthaḥ pādaḥ kramaprāpto vaktavya ity āhanāntaḥprajñam ityādinā /
GV05agsas_1u:315: sarvaśabdapravṛttinimittaśūnyatvāt tasya śabdānabhidheyatvam iti viśeṣapratiṣedhena eva ca turīyaṃ nirdidikṣati /
GV05agsas_1u:317: na mithyāvikalpasya nirnimittatvānupapatter na hi rajatasarpapuruṣamṛgatṛṣṇikādivikalpāḥ śuktikārajjusthāṇur ūṣarādi vyatirekeṇāvastvāspadāḥ śakyāḥ kalpayitum /
GV05agsas_1u:318: evaṃ tarhi prāṇādisarvavikalpāspadatvāt turīyasya śabdavācyatvam iti na pratiṣedhaiḥ pratyāyyatvam /
GV05agsas_1u:322: nāpi pramāṇāntaraviṣayatvaṃ svarūpeṇa gavādivad ātmano nirupādhikatvād /
GV05agsas_1u:330: na ca turīyasyā'tmatvānavagame kāraṇamasti sarvopaniṣadāṃ tādarthyenopakṣayāt /
GV05agsas_1u:337: so 'yam ātmā paramārthāparamārtharūpaś catuṣpāda ity uktas tasyāparamārtharūpam avidyākṛtaṃ rajjusarpādisamam uktaṃ pādatrayalakṣaṇaṃ bījāṅkurasthānīyam /
GV05agsas_1u:338: athedānīṃ bījātmakaṃ paramārthasvarūpaṃ rajjusthānīyaṃ sarpādisthānīyoktasthānatrayānirākaraṇenāha nāntaḥ prajñamityādi /
GV05agsas_1u:339: nāntaḥprajñaṃ na bahiḥprajñaṃ nobhayataḥprajñaṃ na prajñānaghanaṃ na prajñaṃ nāprajñam /
GV05agsas_1u:340: adṛṣṭam avyavahāryam agrāhyam alakṣaṇam acintyam avyapadeśyam ekātmapratyayasāraṃ prapañcopaśamaṃ śāntaṃ śivam advaitaṃ caturthaṃ manyante /
GV05agsas_1u:344: nanv ātmanaś catuṣpātvaṃ pratijñāya prādatrayakathanena eva caturthasyāntaḥ prajñādibhyo anyatve siddhe nāntaḥ prajña ityādi pratiṣedho 'narthakaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:345: na sarpādivikalpapratiṣedhena eva rajjusvarūpapratipattivattryavasthasya evātmanas turīyatvena pratipipādayiṣitatvāt /
GV05agsas_1u:347: yadi hi tryavasthātmavilakṣaṇaṃ turīyam anyat tatpratipattidvārābhāvācchāstropadeśānarthakyaṃ śūnyatāpattir vā /
GV05agsas_1u:348_0: rajjur iva sarpādibhirvikalpyamānā sthānatraye 'py ātmaika evāntaḥ prajñāditvena
GV05agsas_1u:348_2: parisamāptam iti turīyādhigame pramāṇāntaraṃ sādhanāntaraṃ vā ma mṛgyam /
GV05agsas_1u:349: rajjusarpavivekasamakāla iva rajjvāṃ sarpanivṛttiphale sati rajjvadhigayasya /
GV05agsas_1u:350: yeṣāṃ punas tamo 'panayavyatirekeṇa ghaṭādhigame pramāṇaṃ vyāpriyate teṣāṃ chedyāvayavasambandhaviyogavyatirekeṇāny anyatarāvayave 'picchidirvyā priyata ity uktaṃ syāt /
GV05agsas_1u:351_2: tathā nāntarīyakaṃ ghaṭavijñānaṃ na tat pramāṇaphalam /
GV05agsas_1u:352: na ca tadvad apy ātmany adhyāropitāntaḥ prajñatvādivivekakaraṇe pravṛttasya pratiṣedhavijñānapramāṇasyānupāditsitāntaḥ prajñatvadinivṛttivyatirekeṇa turīye vyāpāra upapattiḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:354: tathā ca vakṣyati“jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate“(māṇḍū.kā.1.18) iti /
GV05agsas_1u:357: tasmāt pratiṣedhavijñānapramāṇavyāpārasamakālair vātmany adhyāropitāntaḥ prajñatvādyanarthānivṛttir iti siddham /
GV05agsas_1u:358: nāntaḥ prajñam iti taijasapratiṣedho na bahiṣprajñam iti viśvapratiṣedhaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:363: kathaṃ punarantaḥ prajñatvādīnām ātmani gamyamānānāṃ rajjvādau sarpādivat pratiṣedhādasatvaṃ gamyata ity ucyate /
GV05agsas_1u:364: jñasvarūpāviśeṣe 'pītaretaravyabhicārādrajjvādāv iva sarpadhārādivikalpita bhedavat sarvatrāvyabhicārājjñasvarūpasya satyatvam /
GV05agsas_1u:366: suṣuptasyānubhūyamānatvāt“na hi vijñātur vijñāter viparalopo vidyate“(bṛ.u.4.3.30) iti śruteḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:370: alakṣaṇamaliṅgam ity etad ananumey ity arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:373: ekātmapratyayasāraṃ jāgradādisthāneṣv eko 'yam ātmetyavyabhicārī yaḥ pratyayastenānusaraṇīyam /
GV05agsas_1u:374: athavaika ātmapratyayaḥ sāraṃ pramāṇaṃ yasya turīyasyādhigame tat turīyamekātmapratyayasāram /
GV05agsas_1u:378: ata eva śāntamavikriyaṃ śivaṃ yato 'dvaitaṃ bhedavikalparahitam /
GV05agsas_1u:380: sa ātmā sa vijñeya iti pratīyamānasarpabhūchidradaṇḍādivyatiriktā yathā rajjus tathā tattvamasītyādivākyārtha ātmā“adṛṣṭo draṣṭā“(bṛ.u.3.7.23)
GV05agsas_1u:383: sa vijñeya iti bhūtapūrvagatyā jñāte dvaitābhāvaḥ //7//
GV05agsas_1u:388: advaitaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ devās turyo vibhuḥ smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_1.10 //
GV05agsas_1u:391: prājñataijasaviśvalakṣaṇānāṃ sarvaduḥkhānāṃ nivṛtte īśānas turīya ātmā /
GV05agsas_1u:392: īśāna ity asya vyākhyānaṃ prabhur iti /
GV05agsas_1u:395: avyayo na vyeti svarūpān na vyabhicaratīti yāvat /
GV05agsas_1u:397: yasmād advaitaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ rajjusarpavanmṛṣātvāt sa eṣa devo dyotanāt turīyaś caturtho vibhuvyāpī smṛtaḥ //10//
GV05agsas_1u:402: prājñaḥ kāraṇabaddhas tu dvau tau turye na sidhyataḥ // MandUpK_1.11 //
GV05agsas_1u:407: tattvāgrahaṇān yathāgrahaṇābhyāṃ bījaphalabhāvābhyāṃ tau yathoktau viśvataijasau baddhau saṃgṛhītāviṣyete /
GV05agsas_1u:409: tattvāpratibodhamātram eva hi bījaṃ prājñatve nimittam /
GV05agsas_1u:410: tato dvau tau bījaphalabhāvau tatvāgrahaṇān yathā grahaṇe turye na sidhyato na vidyete na sambhavata ity arthaḥ //11//
GV05agsas_1u:413: kathaṃ punaḥ kāraṇabaddhatvaṃ prājñasya turīye vā tattvāgrahaṇān yathāgrahaṇalakṣaṇau bandhau na sidhyata iti /
GV05agsas_1u:415: nātmānaṃ na parāś caiva na satyaṃ na api cānṛtam /
GV05agsas_1u:416: prājñaḥ kiñcana saṃvetti turyaṃ tat sarvadṛk sadā // MandUpK_1.12 //
GV05agsas_1u:419: ātmavilakṣaṇam avidyābījaprasūtaṃ bāhyaṃ dvaitaṃ prājño na kiñcana saṃvetti tathā viśvataijasau /
GV05agsas_1u:420: tataś cāsau tattvāgrahaṇena tamasānyathā grahaṇabījabhūtena baddho bhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:421: yasmāt turīyaṃ tatsarvadṛksadā turīyādanyasyābhāvāt sarvadā sadaivaiti sarvaṃ ca tadddṛkceti sarvadṛk tasmān na tattvāgrahaṇalakṣaṇaṃ bījaṃ tatra /
GV05agsas_1u:422: tat prasūtasyānyathāgrahaṇasyāpyataivābhāvo na hi savitari sadā prākāśātmake tad viruddham aprakāśanam anyathā prakāśanaṃ vā sambhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:425: atha vā jāgratsvapnayoḥ sarvabhūtāvasthaḥ sarvavastudṛgābhāsas turīyaiveti sarvadṛksadā“nānyad ato 'sti draṣṭṛ“(bṛ.u.3.8.11)
GV05agsas_1u:430: bījanidrāyutaḥ prājñaḥ sā ca turye na vidyate // MandUpK_1.13 //
GV05agsas_1u:434: kathaṃ dvaitāgrahaṇasya tulyatvāt kāraṇabaddhatvaṃ prājñasya eva na turīyasyeti prāptāśaṅkā nivartyate /
GV05agsas_1u:436: sa eva ca viśeṣapratibodhaprasavasya bījaṃ sā bījanidrā tayā yutaḥ prājñaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:437: sadā dṛksvabhāvatvāt tattvāpratibodhalakṣaṇā nidrā turīye na vidyate 'to na kāraṇabandhastasminnityābhiprāyaḥ //13//
GV05agsas_1u:441: na nidrāṃ naiva ca svapnaṃ turye paśyanti niścitaḥ // MandUpK_1.14 //
GV05agsas_1u:448: prājñas tu svapnavarjitakevalaiva nidrayā yuta iti kāraṇabaddha ity uktam /
GV05agsas_1u:449: nobhayaṃ paśyanti turīye niścitā brahmavido viruddhatvāt savitarīva tamaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:450: ato na kāryakāraṇabaddha ity uktas turīyaḥ //14//
GV05agsas_1u:454: anyathā gṛhṇataḥ svapno nidrā tattvam ajānataḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:455: viparyāse tayoḥ kṣīṇe turīyaṃ padam aśnute // MandUpK_1.15 //
GV05agsas_1u:458: svapnajāgaritayoranyathā rajvāṃ sarpa iva gṛhṇatastattvaṃ svapno bhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:461: anyathāgrahaṇaprādhānyāc ca guṇabhūtā nidreti tasmin viparyāsaḥ svapnaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:462: tṛtīye tu sthānetattvājñānalakṣaṇā nidraiva kevalā viparyāsaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:463: atas tayoḥ kāryakāraṇasthānayor anyathāgrahaṇāgrahaṇalakṣaṇaviparyāse kāryakāraṇabandharūpe paramārthatatvapritabodhataḥ kṣīṇe turīyaṃ padam aśnute /
GV05agsas_1u:464: tadobhayalakṣaṇaṃ bandharūpaṃ tatrāpaśyaṃs turīye niścito bhavatīty arthaḥ //15//
GV05agsas_1u:468: ajam anidram asvapnam advaitaṃ budhyate tadā // MandUpK_1.16 //
GV05agsas_1u:471_0: yo 'yaṃ saṃsārī jīvaḥ sobhayalakṣaṇena tattvāpratibodharūpeṇa bījātmanānyathāgrahaṇalakṣaṇena
GV05agsas_1u:471_1: cānādikālapravṛttena māyālakṣaṇena svapnena mamāyaṃ pitā putro 'yaṃ naptā kṣetraṃ
GV05agsas_1u:471_2: paśavo 'ham eṣāṃ svāmī sukhī duḥkhī kṣayito 'ham anena vardhitaś cānena ity evaṃprakārān
GV05agsas_1u:472: yadā vedāntārthatattvābhijñena paramakāruṇikena guruṇā nāsyaivaṃ tvaṃ hetuphalātmakaḥ kiṃ tu tattvam asīti pratibodhyamānas tadaivaṃ pratibudhyate
GV05agsas_1u:473: katham? nāsmin bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ vā janmādibhāvavikāro 'sty ato 'jaṃ sabāhyābhyantarasarvabhāvikāravarjitam ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:474: yasmāj janmādikāraṇabhūtaṃ nāsminn avidyātamobījaṃ nidrā vidyata ity anidram /
GV05agsas_1u:475: anidraṃ hi tat turīyamata evāsvapnaṃ tan nimittatvād anyathāgrahaṇasya /
GV05agsas_1u:476: yasmāc cānidram asvapnaṃ tasmād ajam advaitaṃ turīyam ātmānaṃ budhyate tadā //16//
GV05agsas_1u:479: prapañcanivṛtyā cet pratibudhyate 'nivṛtte prapañce katham advaitam ity ucyate
GV05agsas_1u:480: prapañco yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:481: māyāmātram idaṃ dvaitam advaitaṃ paramārthataḥ // MandUpK_1.17 //
GV05agsas_1u:484: satyam avaṃ syāt prapañco yadi vidyeta rajjvāṃ sarpa iva kalpitatvān na tu sa vidyate /
GV05agsas_1u:486: na hi rajjvāṃ bhrāntibuddhyā kalpitaḥ sarpo vidyamānaḥ sanvivekato nivṛttaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:487: naiva māyā māyāvinā prayuktā tad darśināṃ cakṣurbandhāpagame vidyamānā satī nivṛttā /
GV05agsas_1u:488: tathedaṃ prapañcākhyaṃ māyāmātraṃ dvaitaṃ rajjuvan māyāvivaccadvaitaṃ paramārthatas tasmān na kaścit prapañcaḥ pravṛtto nivṛtto vāstītīty abhiprāyaḥ //17//
GV05agsas_1u:491: nanu śāstā śāstraṃ śiṣya iti vikalpaḥ kathaṃ nivartata ity ucyate
GV05agsas_1u:493: upadeśād ayaṃ vādo jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate // MandUpK_1.18 //
GV05agsas_1u:496: vikalpo vinivarteta yadi kenacit kalpitaḥ syāt /
GV05agsas_1u:497: yathāyaṃ prapañco māyārajjusarpavat tathāyaṃ śiṣyādi bhedavikalpo 'pi prāk pratibodhādevopadeśanimitto 'topadeśādayaṃ vādaḥ śiṣyaḥ śāstā śāstram iti /
GV05agsas_1u:498: upadeśakārye tu jñāne nirvṛtte jñāte paramārthatatve dvaitaṃ na vidyate //18//
GV05agsas_1u:503: adhimātraṃ pādā mātrā mātrāśca pādā akāra ukāro makāra iti // MandUp_8 //
GV05agsas_1u:507: kiṃ punas tadakṣaram ity āha oṃkāraḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:508: so 'yam oṃkāraḥ pādaśaḥ pravibhajyamāno 'dhimātraṃ mātrām adhikṛtya vartata ity adhimātram /
GV05agsas_1u:509: katham? ātmano ye pādāsta oṃkārasya mātrāḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:514: jāgaritasthāno vaiśvānaraḥ akāraḥ prathamā mātrāpterādimattvād vā /
GV05agsas_1u:515: āpnoti ha vai sarvān kāmān ādiś ca bhavati ya evaṃ veda // MandUp_9 //
GV05agsas_1u:518: jāgaritasthāno vaiśvānaro yaḥ sa oṃkārasyākāraḥ prathamā mātrā /
GV05agsas_1u:519: kena sāmānyenety āha āpterāptirvyāptikāreṇa sarvā vāg vyāptā /
GV05agsas_1u:521: tathā vaiśvānareṇa jagat“tasya ha vaitasyātmano vaiśvānarasya mūrdhaiva sutejāḥ“(chā.u.5 /
GV05agsas_1u:525: ādirasya vidyata ityādi madyathaivādimadakārākhyamakṣaraṃ tathaiva vaiśvānaras tasmād vā sāmānyād akāratvaṃ vaiśvānarasya /
GV05agsas_1u:526: tad ekatvavidaḥ phalam āha āpnoti ha vai sarvān kāmānādiḥ prathamaś ca bhavati mahatāṃ ya evaṃ veda yadoktam ekatvaṃ vedety arthaḥ //9//
GV05agsas_1u:529: svapnasthānas taijasa ukāro dvitīyā mātrotkarṣād ubhayatvād vā /
GV05agsas_1u:532: nāsyābrahmavit kule bhavati ya evaṃ veda // MandUp_10 //
GV05agsas_1u:535: svapnasthānas taijaso yaḥ sa oṃkārasyokāro dvitīyā mātrā /
GV05agsas_1u:537: akārād utkṛṣṭa iva hy ukāras tathā taijaso viśvād ubhayatvād akāramakārayor madhyasyokāras tathā viśvaprājñayor madhye taijaso 'tobhayabhāktvasāmānyāt /
GV05agsas_1u:540: samānas tulyaś ca mitrapakṣasyaiva śatrupakṣāṇām apy apradveṣyo bhavati /
GV05agsas_1u:541: abrahmavidasya kule na bhavati ya evaṃ veda //10//
GV05agsas_1u:544: suṣuptasthānaḥ prājño makāraḥ tṛtīyā mātrā miter apīter vā /
GV05agsas_1u:545: minoti ha vā idaṃ sarvam apītiś ca bhavati ya evaṃ veda // MandUp_11 //
GV05agsas_1u:548: suṣuptasthānaḥ prājño yaḥ sa oṃkārasya makāras tṛtīyā mātrā /
GV05agsas_1u:549: kena sāmānyenety āha sāmānyamidam atra mito 'mitirmānaṃ mīyata iva viśvataijasau prājñena pralayotpattyoḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:550: praveśanirgamābhyāṃ prastheneta yavās tathauṃkārasamāptau punaḥ prayoge ca praviśya nirgacchata ivākāroṃkārau makāre /
GV05agsas_1u:553: oṃkāra uccāraṇe hy antyākṣara ekībhūtāvivākāra oṃkārau /
GV05agsas_1u:555: ato vā sāmānyād ekatvaṃ prājñam akārayoḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:556: vidvatphalam āha minoti ha vedaṃ sarvaṃ jagad yāthātmyaṃ jānātīty arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:557: apītiś ca jagat kāraṇātmā bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:563: mātrāsaṃpratipattau syād āptisāmānyam eva ca // MandUpK_1.19 //
GV05agsas_1u:566: viśvasyātvamakāramātratvaṃ yadā vivakṣyate tadāditvasāmānyamuktanyāyenotkaṭamudbhṛtaṃ dṛśyata ity arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:569: āptisāmānyam eva cotkaṭam ity anuvartate ca śabdāt //19//
GV05agsas_1u:573: mātrāsaṃpratipattau syād ubhayatvaṃ tathā vidham // MandUpK_1.20 //
GV05agsas_1u:576: taijasasyātvavijñānokāratvavivakṣāyāmutkarṣo dṛśyate sphuṭaṃ spaṣṭa ity artha ubhayatvaṃ ca sphuṭam eveti /
GV05agsas_1u:581: mātrāsaṃpratipattau tu layasāmānyam eva ca // MandUpK_1.21 //
GV05agsas_1u:584: makāratve prājñasya mitilayāvutkṛṣṭe sāmānya ity arthaḥ //21//
GV05agsas_1u:587: triṣu dhāmasu yat tulyaṃ sāmānyaṃ vetti niścitaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:588: sa pūjyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vandyaś caiva mahāmuniḥ // MandUpK_1.22 //
GV05agsas_1u:591: yathoktasthānatraye yastulyam uktaṃ sāmānyaṃ vetyavam evaitad iti niścito yaḥ sa pūjyo vandyaś ca brahmavilloke bhavati //22//
GV05agsas_1u:594: yathoktaiḥ sāmānyair ātmapādānāṃ mātrābhiḥ sahaikatvaṃ kṛtvā yathoktam oṃkāraṃ pratipadya yo dhyāyati tam
GV05agsas_1u:595: akāro nayate viśvam ukāraś cāpi taijasam /
GV05agsas_1u:596: makāraś ca punaḥ prājñaṃ nāmātre vidyate gatiḥ // MandUpK_1.23 //
GV05agsas_1u:600: akārālambanam oṃkāraṃ vidvān vaiśvānaro bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:604: kṣīṇe tu makāre bījabhāvakṣayādamātra oṃkāre gatir na vidyate kvacid ity arthaḥ //23//
GV05agsas_1u:609: saṃviśaty ātmanātmānaṃ ya evaṃ veda // MandUp_12 //
GV05agsas_1u:612: amātro mātrā yasya nāsti sa amātra oṃkāraś caturthas turīya ātmaiva kevalo 'bhidhānābhidheyarūpayor avāṅmanasayoḥ kṣīṇatvād avyavahāryaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:613: prapañca upaśamaḥ śivo 'dvaitaḥ saṃvṛtta evaṃ yathokta vijñānavatā prayukta oṃkāras trimātras tripāda ātmaiva /
GV05agsas_1u:615: svaṃ pāramārthikam ātmānaṃ ya evaṃ veda /
GV05agsas_1u:616: paramārthadarśī brahmavit tṛtīyaṃ bījabhāvaṃ dagdhvātmānaṃ praviṣṭa iti na puno jāyate turīyasyābījatvāt /
GV05agsas_1u:617: na hi rajjusarpayor viveke rajjvāṃ praviṣṭaḥ sarpo buddhisaṃskārāt punaḥ pūrvavattad vivekinām utthāsyati /
GV05agsas_1u:618_0: mandamadhyamadhiyāṃ tu pratipannasādhakabhāvānāṃ sanmārgagāmināṃ saṃnyāsināṃ mātrāṇāṃ
GV05agsas_1u:618_1: pādānāṃ ca kḷptasāmānyavidāṃ yathāvad upāsyamāna oṃkāro brahmapratipattaya ālambanī
GV05agsas_1u:618_2: bhavati tathā ca vakṣyati'āśramās trividhāḥ'(mā.kā.3.16) ityādi //12 //
GV05agsas_1u:623: oṃkāraṃ pādaśo vidyāt pādā mātrā na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:624: oṃkāraṃ pādaśo jñātvā na kiñcid api cintayet // MandUpK_1.24 //
GV05agsas_1u:627: yathoktaiḥ sāmānyaiḥ pādaiva mātrā mātrāś ca pādās tasmād oṃṅkāraṃ pādaśo vidyād ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:628: evam oṃkāre jñāte dṛṣṭārtham adṛṣṭārthaṃ vā na kiñcit prayojanaṃ cintayet kṛtārthatvād ityarthaḥ //24//
GV05agsas_1u:631: yuñjīta praṇave cetaḥ praṇavo brahma nirbhayam /
GV05agsas_1u:632: praṇave nityayuktasya na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // MandUpK_1.25 //
GV05agsas_1u:635: yuñjīta samādadhyādyathāvyākhyāte paramārtharūpe praṇave ceto manaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:637: na hi tatra sadā yuktasya bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit 'vidvān na bibheti kutaścana'(tai.u.2.9) iti śruteḥ //25//
GV05agsas_1u:640: praṇavo hy aparaṃ brahma praṇavaś ca paraḥ smṛtaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:645: paramārthatā kṣīṇeṣu mātrāpādeṣu para evātmā brahmeti na pūrvaṃ kāraṇam asya vidyata ity apūrvaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:646: nāsyāntaraṃ bhinnajātīyaṃ kiñcid vidyata ity anantaraḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:647: tathā bāhyam anyan na vidyata ity abāhyaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:648: aparaṃ kāryam asya na vidyata ity anaparaḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:649: sabāhyābhyāntaro hy ajaḥ saindhavaghanavat prajñānaghana ityarthaḥ //26//
GV05agsas_1u:652: sarvasya praṇavo hy ādir madhyam antas tathaiva ca /
GV05agsas_1u:653: evaṃ hi praṇavaṃ jñātvā vyaśnute tad anantaram // MandUpK_1.27 //
GV05agsas_1u:658: evaṃ hi praṇavamātmānaṃ māyāvyādisthānīyaṃ jñātvā tatkṣaṇādeva tad ātmabhāvaṃ vyaśnuta ity arthaḥ //27//
GV05agsas_1u:661: praṇavaṃ hīśvaraṃ vidyāt sarvasya hṛdi saṃsthitam /
GV05agsas_1u:662: sarvavyāpinam oṃkāraṃ matvā dhīro na śocati // MandUpK_1.28 //
GV05agsas_1u:665: sarvaprāṇijātasya smṛtipratyayāspade hṛdaye sthitam īśvaraṃ praṇavaṃ vidyāt sarvavyāpinaṃ vyomavad oṃkāram ātmānam asaṃsāriṇaṃ dhīro buddhimān matvā na śocati /
GV05agsas_1u:673: oṃkāro vidito yena sa munir netāro janaḥ // MandUpK_1.29 //
GV05agsas_1u:677: mīyate 'nayeti mātrā paricchittiḥ sānantā yasya sa anantamātraḥ /
GV05agsas_1u:680: oṃkaro yathā vyākhyāto vidito yena sa paramārthatatvasya mananān muniḥ /
